data.title: Digital Archiving Services
data.meta_description: Pressmart Media Limited offering Digital Archiving Services in Hyderabad, Telangana. Get best price and find contact details | ID: 8655404697
data.text:
"Have your published articles longer life via Pressmart E-Archive"

E-Archive is one of the solutions we provide. It is useful for all publications to publish their archival data through our AWS-Server, which is managed by Pressmart.

Pressmart E-archival solution enables organizations to manage and curate their long-term storage requirements in the form of documents, emails, log files, web feeds, images, and videos.

Pressmart also assists publications to monetize its historic content through its relationships with content repurposing services.
